projects.title: Advisor Score
projects.bodyText:
This product provides a frictionless and objective way for clients to understand and visualize how well their financial advisor is performing. Our goal is to equip everyone with the tools they need to make informed financial decisions about their advisor.

Our tool combines industry benchmark statistics with client portfolio performance to deliver the most informed recommendation possibleâ€”without a high barrier to entry.

projects.title: Nucleus
projects.bodyText:
The ultimate task management and study tool for students. It allows users to have their course syllabi automatically parsed, with all deadlines and deliverables extracted to make planning easy. Features include course listings, calendar views, and task lists.

Google Calendar integration and SMS notification reminders are set up for whitelisted users, along with full integration with the Student Learning Portal (D2L) for grade data.

projects.title: Campus Companion
projects.bodyText:
An SMS-based assistant built for on-campus university students to help them navigate common challenges. Designed to assist with everything from accessing mental health resources to booking library rooms.

Hosted on AWS using a Lambda function, with Twilio as the SMS provider.

projects.title: Stock Sentiment Analysis Tool
projects.bodyText:
This project was created to provide valuable insight to users about the different stocks available on the market, to help make better investment decisions.

The UI was developed with React, and the server for pulling stock information was implemented with Flask.
